tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: An awesome experience ,Dr Arko really came out of the box as a savior in helping me getting rid of foreign bodies from my jaw which was creating chronic infection accross my body...An awesome kind of multitasking skill he do possess , a perfect listner , a perfect executionist and last but not the least a very gentle , honest and empathetic person i must add on...Much much better as a doctor than the cream della cream ones available in the market ....Would recommend all a mist visit for any dental / maxillofacial / orthognathic procedures ...Hats off qnd kudos keep up the spirit doc ...
reply_text: Thank you sir for your kind words. We are always here to help you. Happy smiling from now on.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I visited Dr. Arka Das after hearing excellent reviews from our relatives for tooth extraction followed by Dental Implant. He’s very friendly in nature, listens to your problems very well and explains the line of treatment in detail.

During the complete procedure he ensures you’re comfortable and out of fear. I would highly recommend him for any of your dental issues. Thank you Doctor!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: This was my first time at the dentist, that too for a tooth extraction so was naturally very scared. Dr. Das was so patient, nurturing and skilled that all my fears went away in the first 5 minutes. He took time to explain each and every step so that I always knew what was happening and when to prepare myself for any minimal pain. He adjusted the pace of the procedure for my maximum comfort and made the whole thing almost completely pain-free. Wonderful experience!
reply_text: Thank you ma'am for your wonderful words. Happy smiling.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Did a painless wisdom tooth extraction for me. Avoided RCT upon closer inspection of teeth and suggested composite filling instead.  In simpler terms, doctor aims to avoid unnecessary procedures and do what is best for the patient while explaining everything in details and simple words that any patient without medical background can understand.
In view of the COVID-19 Pandemic, the clinic is well cleaned and sanitized, proper precautions are undertaken to ensure patient safety.
reply_text: THANK YOU FOR YOUR KIND WORDS SIR

review: I am so happy that I reached Dr Arka for my horizontal impacted wisdom tooth extraction. I was very nervous when I got to know that my wisdom tooth is horizontal and hitting other tooth and extracting it is the only option. Dr Arka is very polite helpful and committed towers his work. He surgically extracted my tooth with patience. I felt absolutely no pain in surgery and he gave me all suggestions for quick recovery too. God bless him
reply_text: THANK YOU FOR YOUR KIND WORDS MA'AM
